name: Successful login UI
steps: Verify success message 'You logged into a secure area!'

name: Invalid login UI
steps: Verify error message 'Your username is invalid!'

name: Successful login API
steps: Send POST request to https://dummyjson.com/auth/login with valid username and password
Verify response status 200 and accessToken in response

name: Invalid login API
steps: Send POST request to https://dummyjson.com/auth/login with invalid username and password
Verify response status 400 and error message
